summary: Adds 5, 10, 25, and 100x recipes for smelting ingots and 5 and 10x recipes for making leather into strips. Same ratio as vanilla, just quicker!
descriptionHtml:
Adds 5, 10, 25, and 100x recipes for smelting ingots and 5 and 10x recipes for making leather into strips (makes 20 and 40; 1 leather = 4 strips). This mod does not require any DLC and the recipes are hidden unless you have the necessary materials. These recipes use the same proportions as the vanilla recipes and are just for added convenience.

If you notice any bugs, please post a comment or message me on the Nexus. Thank you!
author: gamefreak0010
